cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Oversight and Reform on May 11, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 6104, Building the Next Generation of Federal Employees Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 207 (Wednesday, December 1, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CONNOLLY:
H.R. 6104.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H6859]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 20 - 15.

title: Building the Next Generation of Federal Employees Act
